testcase.classname: Navigating to the saucelab website and adding the product to the cart
testcase.name: Add the product to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to the site URL..............................................passed Given The user enters the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce".passed And The user clicks on the login button.....................................passed When The user clicks on the product sort container..........................passed And Select the sort option as "Price (low to high)".........................passed And Select the inventory item name as Sauce Labs Onesie.....................passed When The user clicks on the Add to cart button..............................passed And The user navigates to the shopping cart link............................passed Then Validate the item name in the cart.....................................passed And The user clicks on the Remove button....................................passed Then Logout of the application..............................................passed
